title: Crucial will no longer sell you RAM as Micron goes business-only
description: It's the end of an era.
content:
Summary
  • Micron will stop selling Crucial consumer products after February 2026; the brand is shifting to business-only.
  • AI demand from data centers has driven global RAM pri… [+2485 chars]
